alert.note: Alert for Apache (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 11:54AM MST until August 16 at 12:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Apache County in northeastern Arizona... * Until 1245 PM MST. * At 1153 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vernon, or 21 miles east of Show Low, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Vernon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
